city.name: Johannesburg City
city.description:
Johannesburg is Southern Africa's Largest City

It's also one of the 100 largest urban areas in the world and is the economic powerhouse of South Africa. In fact, the Globalization and World Cities Research Network considers it an "alpha global city", meaning it's a primary node in the global economic network.
